mapper.select: SELECT puser.phone as phone,expand.*,userplatform.openId,account.id as accountId from power_user_account account INNER JOIN power_user puser on puser.id = account.userId INNER JOIN power_user_expand expand ON expand.agencyId = account.agencyId and puser.id = expand.userId INNER JOIN power_platform_info platform ON platform.agencyId = account.agencyId INNER JOIN power_user_platform userplatform ON platform.id = userplatform.platformId AND puser.id = userplatform.userId WHERE account.id = #{accountId} AND platform.type = #{type}
